item.title: Need help lunar's (!new question!)
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

cool i figured out my last question
i changed to this:

if (objectID == 410) { if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 18787); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to lunar magics!");

now i get on lunar’s, i can do evrything… like use veng etc but when i try to tele it tele’s me (yes :D) but it auto changes me on ancients when i tele…

Read full topic
